A High-Yield Investment

If you spend even any time at all testing bugs each week, OhScenario will pay for itself almost immediately. OhScenario will save you countless hours of emergency bug fixes and give you peace of mind that your application is always bug-free.

Get "100 scenarios for $49" or "500 for $99".

All OhScenario! plans offer:

  • Create testing scenarios quickly with ease.
  • Run your scenarios manually at any time.
  • We'll run your scenarios automatically 2 times a day (and report back to you if they fail).
  • Access to our REST API (or a Github Webhook) to run your scenarios when you deploy.
  • Create macro scenarios that can be referenced by other scenarios (eg. sign in, repetitive tasks).
  • You're not locked in to one domain - run your tests for staging and production in one account.
